entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy northerly rain, and amounts may approach short duration warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Freezing level about 2000 metres in heavy rain. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
